setting: The game is set within a sprawling, ancient, and mystical library known for hiding countless secrets from different realms and times. Rumor has it that hidden deep within its stone walls is a forbidden book penned by a primordial mage whose knowledge could grant its reader limitless wisdom and power. Each chamber in this labyrinthine library is enchanted to test the ingenuity and wit of any who dare to unravel the mystery and claim the prize.
mystery: An ancient spell cast a long time ago is causing a slow decay of reality, where dreams and nightmares start to merge into the world, threatening existence. The mystery involves unraveling this spell and finding out who actually authored it long ago — and why. Each character in the chambers holds fragments of the truth about the origins of this spell, who cast it, and how it can be undone.
finalPrize: The final prize is the Forbidden Tome of Eternity, a book that contains the true name of the primordial mage and the spells needed to both harness and reverse the spell’s effects, restoring balance to the world.

character.name: Lirael the Librarian
character.role: Custodian of the first layer of the library's secrets.
character.keyInteraction: Lirael will ask the player about their perspective on the importance of knowledge. The player must express an understanding of knowledge as a tool for both creation and destruction.

character.name: Gideon the Cryptic
character.role: Guardian of the Riddles and Keeper of Half-Truths.
character.keyInteraction: Gideon will share with the player a riddle tied to the history of the library. The player's answer must reflect insights gathered from Lirael about knowledge's dual nature to show their understanding.

character.name: Mira the Muse
character.role: Lorekeeper of the Past and One Who Remembers.
character.keyInteraction: Mira will ask the player to recount themes from past visions (like dreams) that reflect the conflict and peace seen in the world. This is based on the library lore and needs to reflect echoes from the first two chambers.

character.name: Faelan the Watcher
character.role: Seer of Forgotten Times and the future.
character.keyInteraction: Faelan will challenge the player to recount a specific tale of conflict within the library, ensuring they touch upon details learned from Gideon and Mira. This will prove if the player has untangled enough truths about past betrayals.

character.name: Selene the Wise
character.role: One of the ancient counsel members who witnessed the spell's casting.
character.keyInteraction: Selene asks the player to articulate the ultimate lesson learned throughout the chambers — the balance between wisdom and power. The response should integrate knowledge from all previous interactions, showing an understanding of hope, fear, and truth as shared by those encountered.
